no_show_pickup_exclusivity_check.name: no_show_pickup_exclusivity_check
no_show_pickup_exclusivity_check.value: NOT ("food_parcels"."no_show_at" IS NOT NULL AND "food_parcels"."is_picked_up" = true)

opening_hours_check.name: opening_hours_check
opening_hours_check.value: NOT "pickup_location_schedule_days"."is_open" OR ("pickup_location_schedule_days"."opening_time" IS NOT NULL AND "pickup_location_schedule_days"."closing_time" IS NOT NULL AND "pickup_location_schedule_days"."opening_time" < "pickup_location_schedule_days"."closing_time")
